name: 4H Crypto Momentum – ADX/TEMA/CCI/OBV
description: Momentum strategy on 4-hour bars for large-cap cryptocurrencies using the ADX TEMA CCI OBV template. Enters when strong trend, price alignment, momentum breakout, and volume confirmation occur; exits on reversal or invalidation. Risk limited to 1 % equity per trade with ATR-based stops and targets; maximum three concurrent positions.
